results.title: Citations: NAP consistency across major directories (prominence reinforcement)
evidence: Only 3 citations listed. Add major directories (Apple Maps, Bing, Yelp, etc.).
fix: Build a citations list and keep NAP consistent.
If service-area business (SAB), be consistent about address display where applicable.

results.title: LocalBusiness/Electrician JSON-LD is wired into layout (entity clarity)
evidence: Schema builder exists and layout references it.
fix: Implement LocalBusiness (Electrician) JSON-LD and inject it globally in app/layout.tsx.
Ensure schema data matches visible NAP and service areas.
results.codexPrompt: Add LocalBusiness/Electrician JSON-LD using a schema builder and inject via <script type="application/ld+json"> in app/layout.tsx. Ensure telephone and areaServed match SITE config.

results.title: GBP: Appointment URL includes UTM tracking (lead attribution)
fix: Set GBP appointment URL to /booking with UTMs: utm_source=gbp&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=maps.

results.title: GBP: Photos are fresh (recent uploads)
fix: Upload new, real job photos weekly (panels, EV chargers, lighting, team, before/after).

results.title: GBP: Posting cadence is consistent (local engagement)
fix: Post weekly (2–4 posts/month): before/after, safety tips, seasonal generator readiness, etc.

results.title: GBP: Primary category is set (relevance)
fix: Ensure primary category is accurate (commonly “Electrician”). Add only truly relevant secondary categories.

results.title: GBP: Owner response rate meets threshold (trust + prominence)
fix: Respond to reviews consistently (target 90%+ response rate).

results.title: GBP: Reviews meet quality threshold (rating + count)
fix: Implement a review SOP: ask every satisfied customer, respond to every review.
Aim for steady growth and recent reviews.

results.title: GBP: Service-area business hides address (compliance + distance clarity)
evidence: GBP address is hidden for service-area business.
fix: In Google Business Profile: set as Service-area business and hide address if you travel to customers.
Ensure service areas are correctly configured.
results.codexPrompt: No code change: update GBP settings to hide address if SAB. Then update local-seo/gbp-profile.json to reflect the change.

results.title: GBP: Service areas align with SITE.serviceAreas
evidence: GBP and site service areas match exactly.
fix: Keep GBP service areas and website service area list consistent.
If the business expands/shrinks, update both at the same time.
results.codexPrompt: Update src/config/site.ts (SITE.serviceAreas) or local-seo/gbp-profile.json so the lists match (same spelling/cities).

results.title: GBP: Service areas count is within Google’s limit (≤ 20)
fix: Reduce GBP service areas to 20 or fewer; prioritize revenue cities and realistic coverage.

results.title: GBP: Services list is populated (relevance to queries)
evidence: GBP services count is low (2). Add core services.
fix: Add your core services to GBP (panel upgrades, EV chargers, generators, troubleshooting, lighting).

results.title: GBP: Website URL host matches site host (relevance consistency)
fix: Update GBP website URL to the canonical site host (prefer https + primary domain).

results.title: Location pages are not thin/templated (doorway risk check)
fix: Keep only a few high-value location pages and make them genuinely useful (local proof, FAQs, travel expectations).
Avoid scaling dozens of near-identical city pages (doorway risk).

results.title: Site phone is valid E.164 (+1XXXXXXXXXX) and not a placeholder
fix: Set SITE.phoneE164 to a real E.164 phone number (e.g., +1616XXXXXXX).
results.codexPrompt: Update src/config/site.ts to set SITE.phoneE164 and SITE.phoneDisplay with real values.

results.title: Contact surface includes clickable tel: and sms: links (lead friction reduction)
evidence: Found tel: and sms: in codebase.
fix: Add a Call/Text CTA component and use it on /contact, /booking, and on high-intent service pages.
results.codexPrompt: Create a CallTextCTA component with tel: and sms: links and include it on contact + booking pages.

results.title: Site: /service-areas mentions all configured service areas (distance reinforcement)
evidence: /service-areas verification unavailable in static mode. Run --mode=live.
fix: Ensure /service-areas lists every city you serve (match GBP service areas).
Add scheduling/travel expectations and link to top services.
results.codexPrompt: Expand /service-areas page: list each city in SITE.serviceAreas, add travel expectations, and link to Residential/Commercial hubs + top service pages.

results.title: robots.txt is implemented in repo (Next metadata route or public file)
fix: Add app/robots.ts (Next metadata route) or public/robots.txt at site root.
results.codexPrompt: Create app/robots.ts (Next.js App Router metadata route) that references sitemap and allows crawling of public pages. Ensure /robots.txt returns 200.

results.title: sitemap.xml is implemented in repo (Next metadata route or static public sitemap)
fix: Add app/sitemap.ts (Next metadata route) or generate public/sitemap.xml at build time.
results.codexPrompt: Create app/sitemap.ts that lists core pages and service pages using config-driven slugs.
